mapper.select: select chat_id from chat_view where cr_enabled = 'Y' and cm_enabled = 'Y' and member_id = #{memberId}
select chat_id from chat_view where chat_id = #{chatId}
mapper.insert: insert into chat_member(id, chat_room_id, member_id) values(seq_chat.nextval, #{id}, #{memberId})
insert into chat_log (id, chat_room_id, member_id, msg, time) values( seq_chat.nextval, (select id from chat_room where chat_id = #{chatId}), #{memberId}, #{msg}, #{time} )
mapper.select: select * from chat_log where chat_room_id = (select id from chat_room where chat_id = #{chatId}) order by id
